name: Combo King
description:
The thieves have broken into your castle and are only one room away from your crown! Unfortunately, your guards have taken a day off, so the duty is in your hands. Fight off the thieves in the last room and protect your crown for as long as you can hold out!

Gain points by knocking the enemies into the side pits while you have a combo active, but avoid falling into the pits yourself!

Controls

A, D - Move left and right

LeftShift - Kick

E - Punch

Good luck, for it's time to prove yourself as a Combo King.

Assets

Music: Bit by Bit Bert 8-Bit Music Booster Pack

Sounds: Beep Yeah! 8-Bit SFX Pack

Font: Pixeled Dafont

#sidequest
